# Ask Jon Kay Anything

**From:** Blocked and Reported <blockedandreported@substack.com>
**Date:** Mon, 12 Jan 2026 21:55:57 +0000
**Source:** [View original](https://www.blockedandreported.org/p/ask-jon-kay-anything)

---

View this post on the web at https://www.blockedandreported.org/p/ask-jon-kay-anything

Our next guest will be Quillette’s Jonathan Kay, joining us to discuss all things Canada (and more). Jon has graciously agreed to stay on after the free episode to record a little something extra for our Primos, so if you’ve always wanted to know Jon’s thoughts on ultimate frisbee, board games, the benefits of dog shampoo, or anything else, leave your questions in the comments by 9 AM ET on Friday, January 16th.
